name: Bees Homework Financial Freedom Plan
description: Helping me to do my homework of putting GTT orders on Angelone for the Bees by letting access NSE latest closing price data! (As NSE earlier blocked for for opening 6 tabs in a second using bookmarks and blocked my IP for 10 minutes to access the there website to get quotes, so i made this extension to automatically opened the tabs after specified intervals to fetch closing price of NiftyBees BankBees Mid150Bees JuniorBees GoldBees SilverBees, and create a GTT order on Angel One according to my Financial Freedom Plan!
